resources.string: Wear the headband and adjust the electrode contact as prompted
The change of the power ratio of the brainwaves reflects the change of mental state during meditation.
HRV changes with the state of meditation. The HRV is generally higher in the relaxed state. With long-term meditation practice, the overall level of HRV will increase.

In general, the change of heart rate is disordered. Through long-term training, the heart rate can be seen in a certain periodic rhythm during meditation. At this time, the breathing and heartbeat reach a coordinated state.

If you do not have long-term meditation training, your brainwaves in a specific brain state is concentrated. When you are focused, the Relaxation value is generally low, and when you are relaxed, the Attention value is low. Attention and Relaxation are mutually exclusive. After long-term practice of meditation, brainwaves are spread more broadly and even. You can be relaxed and focused at the same time with a high score of both Attention and Relaxation. In this state, it is easier to have inspiration and creativity.

Deep breathing training can effectively reduce stress, and long-term meditation training can improve stress resilience. Pressure and relaxation graphs reflect your relaxation state on physical and phycological level.
There are 3 different sizes of rubber bands. Please choose the band that fits closely to your head.
Adjust the headband so that the sensors fit snugly to the skin and the headband is in the middle of your forehead.
Please make sure there is no hair between the sensors and the skin.
When you speak or move eyes, these facial muscle activities will interfere in signal detection. If the signal is not stable, try to relax your face and eyes.
Skincare products, cosmetics, and sebum will prevent the sensors from detecting signals. Please clean the skin with a wet wipe to improve signal quality if needed.
Dry skin or dryness caused by the environment will affect signal detection. Please moisturize the skin with a wet wipe to improve signal quality if needed.
After each adjustment, it takes 30 seconds to 1 minute to detect the signals. Just relax and take a few breaths.
Wear the headband and adjust the sensor according to the illustration.
Press and hold the button until the indicator lights up. If the light is not on, charge the device first and try again after 10 minutes.
Meditation complete, exit and generate report.
Connect the headband to show data
Drag and drop to reorder dashboard.
The report requires at least 3 minutes of meditation.
Meditation time must not less than 3 minutes!
When meditation timer ends, we will play the end sound to remind you.
We won\'t post anything with your Facebook. By signing means you agree with our Terms and Privacy
Logout will not delete any data. You can still log in with this account.
Biosensing Meditation Headband provide rich data feedback including brainwaves, heart rate, heart rate variability, etc. to perceive your performance better.
The meditation time is shorter than the average of last 7 times.
Master meditation by brainwave & heart-rate biosensing technology.
Regulate meditation performance by visualized rich data.
Minimum light. Maximum comfort. Unique elegant design. Weight: 28g.
Please press and hold the power button for 4 seconds. The paired device will have a blue flashing light.
If there is no light after the button is held for more than 4 seconds, please charge the device first. Try again in 10 minutes.
Make sure the device is near your phone. If there are other Bluetooth smart devices around, please put them away.
Check the Bluetooth status in the system settings to make sure Bluetooth is turned on.
If Bluetooth is already on, turn it off and on.
After above operations are done, return to search for the device.
Allow related permissions for Bluetooth connection
In order to protect user privacy, Android 6.0 or later versions needs you to apply for location access when accessing the Unique Device Identifier.
The device will be restarted and connected automatically to your phone. Please keep the device near the phone.
It takes a few minutes to update the firmware.Please keep the device near your phone.
The device will be restarted and connected automatically to your phone.Please keep the device near the phone.
Please go back to connect the device again and retry.
The meditation time is longer than the average of last 7 times.
The meditation time is shorter than the average of last 7 times.
The meditation time is the same as the average of last 7 times.
